title: Medialink Wireless-N USB Adapter (300 Mbps) - 802.11n, 2.4 ghz - Compatible with Windows 8 / Windows 7 / Windows Vista / Windows XP
description: Medialink Wireless-N USB Adapter (300 Mbps)Easy Wi-Fi installation for your PC or laptop. Surf the web, file share, Email, stream videos & more at speeds up to 300Mbps. It's simplistically designed so even novice users have no trouble. All of the latest wireless security features are supported to encrypt data & prevent unauthorized use. Backwards compatible with USB 1.0.Product Features- Connects PC's/laptops to a wireless router, gateway or hotspot (with existing internet service plan)- Wireless connection speeds up to 300 Mbps- High-speed USB 2.0 (works with USB 3.0/1.0)- Supports WEP, WPA & WPA2 security- Easy setup auto-detects network transmission rate & provides infrastructure/ad-hoc mode- Supports 20MHz/40MHz bandwidthSpecifications- Standard: IEEE802.11g, IEEE802.11b, IEEE802.11n- Supports 64/128-bit WEP, WPA, WPA2 & 802.1x- Supports WPS & WMM- Transmission power: Max 15dbm- Modulation method: OFDM, CCKCompatibility- PC's/laptops with a USB port, 733MHz CPU & 64MB memory- Any brand 802.11g/802.11n router or hotspot using 2.4 GHz wavelength- Won't work with Xbox 360, PS3, Blu-Ray, Roku, devices without operating systems (OS), or dual band routers only broadcasting N-speeds on 5GHz wavelengthInstallationPlug in the adapter & the included CD, which auto-detects your OS & installs the appropriate drivers on startupNotesWindows 8/7 users can plug-&-play without the CDPackage Contents- 1 x USB adapter- 1 x Setup CD- 1 x User guideCertificationsMicrosoft WHQL Certified to be compatible with 32/64-bit Windows 7, Vista, XP & 2000 (Windows 8 fully compatible & pending certification)WarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
